attributes.action: Implement a sales embargo on all vw group vehicles
attributes.background: For seven years VW group have conned the UK government and the UK public with their emissions scandal. All sales of the VW group should be banned until customers are fully compensated.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the European Union and not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition asking for the UK to work with the EU on this issue.
